name: CHOP! CHOP! (Keyboard Games)
description:
(Fixed) Chop Chop Is A Game Where "Chop" (Our Main Chinchilla-Cyborg) Escapes From The Slavery He Was Held Under By The Vodes (The Superior Cyborg Race).  He Must Help Save His Fellow Chinchilla-Cyborg Buddies In This Action-Filled Adventure Side-Scroller.

MetaFab Was Used For The Currency In This Game And The Economic System The Game Uses With Shops And The Player's Wallet.

Identified Bug (don't have time to fix currently):
The Menu Doesn't Work When You're In A Shop (which makes it difficult to see how many coins you have when in a shop)

Level 2 & Level 3 Only Work In The Official Window and Mac Release (Not HTML).

This was a great first game-jam for me, and I would like to thank the MetaFab community for this great experience. Thank you. (I am so tired)

Unique Bullets: The Bullet Sizes Increase When You Hold Down The Left Mouse Button

Control Info:
Backspace - Menu

A/Left - Move Left

D/Right - Move Right

Space - Jump

Once Unlocked:

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

Hold Left Mouse Click - Increases Bullet Size

1 - Plasma Gun

2 - Shotgun

Credits:
All Art Assets And Sounds Were Created By Me During The Jam Period

The Game Was Programmed With GDevelop And The MetaFab API By Me.
